<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">[Magic Weapon](/Spells.aspx?ID=182)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 349 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Spell Lists**
[Elemental](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=5)

**Patron Theme**
[Rune](/Patrons.aspx?ID=6)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 weapon that is unattended or wielded by you or a willing ally
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

The weapon glimmers with magic and energy. The target becomes a _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) weapon_, gaining a +1 item bonus to attack rolls and increasing the number of weapon damage dice to two.
name: Magic Weapon
